ygData.subject: RE: Hammer of Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Stratics lists it as 6dmg, 29dly. I am only level 21 so I cannot verify that is true. Astur il Ayan, Cleric of Brell Solusek Ro
ygData.messageBody:
Stratics lists it as 6dmg, 29dly. I am only level 21 so I cannot verify that
is true.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro


> -----Original Message-----
> From: devotion_con@... [mailto:devotion_con@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 2:39 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Hammer of Stuff
>
>
> From: devotion_con@...
>
> Hello, all. I have been using the Hammer of Wrath since level 9.
> I have looked all over the web to find the stats of the later
> hammers I can summon, but have been unable to find them. Could
> somebody let me know the stats for the other hammers? Thanks. I
> know they aren't the best in "ratio", but they will always be my
> favorite because they are a gift from Rodcet Nife. Also, while
> lurking I have noticed a lot of complaints that there aren't any
> cleric only weapons in the game. Heh. Who else gets to use the
> Hammer of Wrath? :) Devotion Guildmaster - Clerics of Norrath Povar
>
